name: Web Application Pentest (Advanced)
description: Comprehensive Web Application Security Testing - Beyond OWASP Top 10

deliverables.title: Application Mapping
deliverables.description: Map application structure, endpoints, and functionality
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM services WHERE port IN (80, 443, 8080, 8443)

deliverables.title: Authentication Testing
deliverables.description: Test authentication mechanisms, session management, and credential handling
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%authentication%' OR title LIKE '%session%' OR title LIKE '%login%'

deliverables.title: Authorization Testing
deliverables.description: Test for IDOR, privilege escalation, and access control bypasses
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%IDOR%' OR title LIKE '%authorization%' OR title LIKE '%access control%'

deliverables.title: Injection Testing
deliverables.description: Test for SQL, NoSQL, OS Command, LDAP, and other injection vulnerabilities
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%injection%' OR title LIKE '%SQLi%'

deliverables.title: XSS Testing
deliverables.description: Test for reflected, stored, and DOM-based XSS vulnerabilities
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%XSS%' OR title LIKE '%cross-site scripting%'

deliverables.title: CSRF Testing
deliverables.description: Test for Cross-Site Request Forgery vulnerabilities
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%CSRF%'

deliverables.title: Business Logic Testing
deliverables.description: Test for business logic flaws and workflow bypasses

deliverables.title: File Upload Testing
deliverables.description: Test file upload functionality for unrestricted uploads
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%upload%' OR title LIKE '%file%'

deliverables.title: API Security Testing
deliverables.description: Test REST/GraphQL APIs for security vulnerabilities
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%API%' OR title LIKE '%REST%' OR title LIKE '%GraphQL%'

deliverables.title: Security Headers Analysis
deliverables.description: Analyze HTTP security headers and cookie configurations
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%header%' OR title LIKE '%cookie%'

deliverables.title: SSRF Testing
deliverables.description: Test for Server-Side Request Forgery vulnerabilities
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%SSRF%'

deliverables.title: Deserialization Testing
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%deserialization%'
